channel.title: 317 Random Things I Need Assistance With :)
channel.description:
so im pretty new to java. i wanted to make a little thing in edgeville for me and 1-3 friends. i got a blank client and blank source, so i could just put little things here and there and some npcs as shops.
i reorganized what i was looking for help with so if you would like to help it's easier
1. shops - below i was told "shops.cfg". i see it, but i don't know what to do with it lol. i do see a shop handler class and java file but i dont know how to edit those so they will be shops. i think i have an idea and i will experiment with it, it could possibly work. --FAILED lol. 2. i have pking, it's in the wildy like normal, but i would like to make it everywhere except edge bank itself. 3. the spawn, i tried using coordinates but for some reason instead of edgeville im in burthope lol. i did double check and mine were right but its still in burthope. 4. is there a way i can put my own commands in? like ::money or ::teletome (name)? i would like commands but i dont know where they go. 5. since im using a blank client, where can i go to edit the background and the login buttons n stuff? im looking but i dont know where. - DONE FEW PROBLEMS 6. im using a blank server so do i have to add ancients and lunar and range? i want them to work (lol) and be able to go from a distance instead of running up to the person. 7. to add to magic, alters would be cool 8. how to add items in the correct slots? i have bandos stuff going in the weapon slot with everything else, how do i prevent/fix that? i do know this list is extensive and could take alot work but im willing to learn and take the time to do it. i tried to use blank sources and clients to do most of it myself ( with help) instead of just modifying somebody elses. i dont know if using a blank surce and client is considered leeching and im sorry if it is, but this is as much work as i can do, without making a whole runescape world myself and with the buildings and all.

item.title: 317 Random Things I Need Assistance With :)
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

so im pretty new to java. i wanted to make a little thing in edgeville for me and 1-3 friends. i got a blank client and blank source, so i could just put little things here and there and some npcs as shops.

i reorganized what i was looking for help with so if you would like to help it’s easier

  1. shops - below i was told “shops.cfg”. i see it, but i don’t know what to do with it lol. i do see a shop handler class and java file but i dont know how to edit those so they will be shops. i think i have an idea and i will experiment with it, it could possibly work. --FAILED lol.
  2. i have pking, it’s in the wildy like normal, but i would like to make it everywhere except edge bank itself.
  3. the spawn, i tried using coordinates but for some reason instead of edgeville im in burthope lol. i did double check and mine were right but its still in burthope.
  4. is there a way i can put my own commands in? like ::money or ::teletome (name)? i would like commands but i dont know where they go.
  5. since im using a blank client, where can i go to edit the background and the login buttons n stuff? im looking but i dont know where. - DONE FEW PROBLEMS
  6. im using a blank server so do i have to add ancients and lunar and range? i want them to work (lol) and be able to go from a distance instead of running up to the person.
  7. to add to magic, alters would be cool
  8. how to add items in the correct slots? i have bandos stuff going in the weapon slot with everything else, how do i prevent/fix that?
    i do know this list is extensive and could take alot work but im willing to learn and take the time to do it. i tried to use blank sources and clients to do most of it myself ( with help) instead of just modifying somebody elses. i dont know if using a blank surce and client is considered leeching and im sorry if it is, but this is as much work as i can do, without making a whole runescape world myself and with the buildings and all.

Read full topic
